title: Watch Face - Santas Christmas Time: Animated+Games
summary: 3D animated, interactive xmas Watch Face with games and a countdown to christmas
description: XMas Watch face and funny christmas wearable games in one? Yes its real an it is fun.You have never seen a christmas watchface like this, it is not just a watch face it's an interactive adventure you can play on your smartwatch, explore on your wrist and yes you also can check the time by the way. Compatible with all Android smartwatches (round and square). If you find one that is not, let us know and we get on it.This interactive watchface will be enhanced with several new features until christmas, it will change the scenes, new interaction will get available and you will have special date bound events."Ho ho ho" - is it just a christmas watch face or is it already a christmas wearable game? We think it's both! A watch face game and an interactive christmas watch face in 3D.Be excited about what's going to happen when Santa Claus enters the stage!I would say you can wear one of the best (or even the best) christmas watch face games in the market on your wrist!The key features of Interactive Christmas Watch Face are:✔ Optimized for round and square smartwatches✔ Ready to use, no configuration necessary to use the watch face✔ Christmas timer inclusive✔ Animated scenes. Click on the upper right, klick on the house, change the scene✔ Wearable games included✔ Decent ambient, animated and colorful regular modeMerry Christmas every body! Our christmas gift for you, our xmas watch face!Guide:- tap the horizon to switch day and nightmode- tap the top to view the countdown in the beautiful skymode (diffrent day an night scenes)- tap the little elves house when you beat the game- tap the magician to let it snow and then the upper sky....- tap the gray elve to start the "catch me if you can" game- explore other secrets and stay tuned for future updates**Please review our watch face and give us feedback, you're missing a feature? Only through your feedback, we can optimize our OptimusByte wearable watch faces for an even better experience on your smart watch! Contact us if you miss something.**All android wear watches are supported, f.ex.: Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected. descriptionHTML:
XMas Watch face and funny christmas wearable games in one? Yes its real an it is fun.

You have never seen a christmas watchface like this, it is not just a watch face it's an interactive adventure you can play on your smartwatch, explore on your wrist and yes you also can check the time by the way.

Compatible with all Android smartwatches (round and square). If you find one that is not, let us know and we get on it.

This interactive watchface will be enhanced with several new features until christmas, it will change the scenes, new interaction will get available and you will have special date bound events.

"Ho ho ho" - is it just a christmas watch face or is it already a christmas wearable game?
We think it's both! A watch face game and an interactive christmas watch face in 3D.

Be excited about what's going to happen when Santa Claus enters the stage!
I would say you can wear one of the best (or even the best) christmas watch face games in the market on your wrist!

The key features of Interactive Christmas Watch Face are:
✔ Optimized for round and square smartwatches
✔ Ready to use, no configuration necessary to use the watch face
✔ Christmas timer inclusive
✔ Animated scenes. Click on the upper right, klick on the house, change the scene
✔ Wearable games included
✔ Decent ambient, animated and colorful regular mode

Merry Christmas every body!
Our christmas gift for you, our xmas watch face!

Guide:
- tap the horizon to switch day and nightmode
- tap the top to view the countdown in the beautiful skymode (diffrent day an night scenes)
- tap the little elves house when you beat the game
- tap the magician to let it snow and then the upper sky....
- tap the gray elve to start the "catch me if you can" game
- explore other secrets and stay tuned for future updates

**Please review our watch face and give us feedback, you're missing a feature? Only through your feedback, we can optimize our OptimusByte wearable watch faces for an even better experience on your smart watch! Contact us if you miss something.**

All android wear watches are supported, f.ex.:
Moto 360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Sony Smartwatch 3, Samsung Gear Live, Asus ZenWatch, Huawei Watch, Fossil Q Founder, Casio WSD-F10 and Tag Heuer Connected.

Watch faces by Optimusbyte Wearable Apps
